What a Muslim should say when he is prai.ARABIC_TEXT: ((اللَّهُمَّ لاَ تُؤَاخِذْنِي بِمَا يَقُولُونَ، وَاغْفِرْ لِي مَا لاَ يَعْلَمُونَ، [وَاجْعَلْنِي خَيْراً مِمَّا يَظُّنُّونَ])).
What a Muslim should say when he is prai.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: Allaahumma laa tu'aakhithnee bimaa yaqooloona, waghfir lee maa laa ya'lamoona [waj'alnee khayram-mimmaa yadhunnoon]
What a Muslim should say when he is prai.TRANSLATED_TEXT: O Allah, do not call me to account for what they say and forgive me for what they have no knowledge of [and make me better than they imagine].
